data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Luquillo, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Luquillo, Puerto Rico

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Luquillo.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 17,700 people living in the state of Luquillo.
Spirit, of the 10,980 people in the state of Luquillo who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 5,755 believers in Luquillo to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 5,755 believers in the state of Luquillo.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Luquillo, Puerto Rico need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.section_summary:
the state of Luquillo, Puerto Rico has a population of 17,700.

We estimate Luquillo has 5,755 people who might know Jesus, 10,980 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 965 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 3 neighbors who need Jesus.
